p: Of the 32 patients with symptoms and anti-CHIKV IgG positivity in the bDMARD group, 28% had symptoms lasting more than three months, while in the control group, this presentation occurred in 64.2% of subjects ( p=0.021). When analyzed by bDMARD class and compared with the control group, only the patients using anti-TNF biologicals showed statically significant difference ( p < 0.001) ( Table 2).
